patthana20.5:1.1: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:2.1: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:3.1: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:5.1: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:6.1: Nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana20.5:7.1: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:9.1: Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:10.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:11.1: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:12.1: Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:13.1: Nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:14.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:15.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:16.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:17.1: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:19.1: Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:20.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:21.1: Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:22.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:23.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:24.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:25.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:26.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:27.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:28.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:29.1: Naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:30.1: Nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:31.1: Naajjhattikañca nabāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:32.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:33.1: Naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:34.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.5:35.1: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.5:36.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
